title: You Will Regret It (Part 1)
body:
You Will Regret It (Part 1)

Just as the horned Ice wolf died the buff that it gave to the other wolves also ended and they once again became normal C rank ice wolves.

The remaining two ice wolves suddenly felt their power decreasing and were taken aback.

Valery who was fighting against them didn't miss the chance and many icicles formed around her.

The icicles shot toward the ice wolves splitting apart the surrounding air.

Swish! Swish!

Both ice wolves tried to stop the icicle using ice walls, but without the buff of the horned Ice wolf, their ice walls shattered like fragile glass when icicles clashed against them.

Howl!!!

Both wolves howled in pain as their bodies were pierced by tens of icicles turning them into meat skewers.

Red blood painted the white ground of the forest and the life force of the both wolves disappeared.

Valery sighed in relief and quickly started to look for cores before more monsters arrive.
